title: Just a quick question
body: How much is a champion release bundle. I want to know so I can buy stuff with my rp and still buy the kled bundle.

replies.body: Champion release bundles could vary in price, so it wouldn't be fair to give an exact amount.  We don't have information on unreleased content, so keep an eye out on our[ news page ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)as updates and pricing will likely be provided there.  Hope that helps!

depends on how many skins come with it.

according to to others  It should be 487 + 975
